author: vors
body:
- [ ] Resolves issue #abcd.
- [x] Code is [rebased](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/git/README.md#sync-your-local-repo) on `origin/master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [x] Update all relevant [documentation](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/master/docs).
- Fix two broken links in docs
- Update `.gitignore`
- Update `testing-guidelines.md` to account to fact that we have only one badge for Travis CI now

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body:
Please make sure that you add a meaningful title and use the pull request template per the [contribution guide](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#pull-request-submission).
- [X] Updated title for you.
- [ ] Please fill out pull request template

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
Updated template.

I removed it on purpose, because the template is not very suitable for docs changes.

title: Fix two broken links in docs
